label: goodsOwnershipChangeDateTime
comment: The date, time, date time, or other date time value for the goods ownership change, at line level, for this trade delivery.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value, at header level, when the goods ownership of this trade delivery changed.

domainIncludes.comment: Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a header level.
Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a line level.
